alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:25PM EST until January 11 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Virginia...North Carolina... Dan River near STP near Danville affecting Caswell, City of Danville, Rockingham and Pittsylvania independent cities. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, STP near Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River near STP near Danville. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect Riverside shopping center. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:45 PM EST Wednesday was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.3 feet on 02/24/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 530 AM EST.
